name: SaiBhajansInKannada
0:
”Alexa, open Kannada Bhajans”
”Alexa, start Kannada Bhajans”
”Alexa, launch Kannada Bhajans”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kannada bhajans
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The term bhajanam in Sanskrit means reverence and originates from the root word bhaj, meaning to revere. Bhajan is also commonly used to refer a group event, with one or more lead singers, accompanied with music and sometimes dancing! Sai Bhajan's give immense joy and happiness to their devotees. Singing the glory of Sai Baba by completely surrendering to him and experiencing supreme bless is unsurpassed! Before listening to the Bhajans, we request devotees to invoke Sai Baba mentally infront of them and pray to him. While listening, you can say, Alexa Next, Alexa Previous, Alexa Pause, Alexa Resume, Alexa Stop, to navigate through the songs! May Sai bless you!

Credits Kannada Bhajans: Sri Chandru, Sharath, Purushotham Chendla, Narendra Kabbinale, Anuradha Bhatt, Rajesh Krishnan,K S Surekha,Ajay Wariyar, Ravindra Soragavi, Meghana Kulakarni, L N Shastri, Suman Sridhar, Suman Shashidhar, Hemanth , Sriraksha, Priyam, Aravind

Sai Bhajans in Kannada is a part of our popular Shirdi Sai Baba All-In-One App that is available across all App stores and is by OmniSai.Org, a US 501(C)(3) Nonprofit Organization. We have App users / Site visitors from 150 countries, 49 states in USA, all 29 states in India and from ~3000 cities Worldwide. The most comprehensive Free "App / Resource For And by Sai Volunteers!". No Ads, No Hidden Agenda! We do not collect user data or monetize through any means. Simply experience the best! We intend to never advertise in our apps or on our website and intend to keep this service always FREE.
